page.title: 01Features of Rural Langford.
page.content: In this rural area is the small village of Langford. There are about 500 people living in the area and most of them are old and retired.Some of the people work on the eight farms in the area and a number are builders.The only other employment is with one of the small firms at Little Clanfield or with Collets Crane Hire in the village which has a number of mobile cranes for lifting work.Most of the houses in the area are old with only seven being less than twenty years old. Most of the roads lead into or out of Langford and all are minor roads.One of the roads is a single track gated road. The area has: a church,a chapel,three pubs,a shop,a post office,a private tennis club,two village halls and a school. It is a flat low-lying area not far from the River Thames.
